thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Corrections & Amplifications

author: wsjcom
title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
0 COMMENTS Republicans suffered electoral defeats after the government shutdown in the 1990s; the more recent shutdown in 2013 had no such immediate impact. A U.S. News analysis piece Sept. 26 about John Boehner ’s decision to step down as speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives incorrectly referred to the GOP having suffered electoral defeats after the last shutdown.
VMware Inc., VMW -1.93 % a seller of data-center software, expects to achieve $1 billion in total revenue synergies from Dell Inc.’s proposed acquisition of EMC Corp. EMC -1.60 % , VMware’s biggest shareholder. A Technology article Wednesday about VMware and the deal incorrectly said VMware expects to achieve such synergies annually.
Continental Resources Inc. CLR 3.31 % has 1,100 employees. In some editions Tuesday, a Business & Tech. article about cutbacks at energy firms incorrectly said the company has 11,000 employees.
The Pittsburgh & Lake Erie Railroad was incorrectly called the Pennsylvania & Lake Erie Railroad in an Off Duty article Saturday about cycling the Great Allegheny Passage.
